author: Loungecove.com
install_msg: Giveaway cog with in-memory storage. Supports adding old giveaways and manual entrant addition. Report bugs in the 3rd party cog server.
name: Giveaways
short: Giveaway cog with in-memory storage, old giveaway recovery, and manual entrant addition.
description: Giveaway cog with in-memory storage, featuring duration/end timing, role-based restrictions, multipliers, crash recovery, and commands to add old giveaways or entrants manually.
